name: POLTERGUNS
description:
Hello there!

POLTERGUNS is a fast-paced local 1v1 game, where you and your friend/foe/rival from the enemy gang  are presented with haunted guns containing scary ghost-bullets! Oh, the terror!

Bullets are visible for a brief period of time after you shoot them and also when they ricochet off the walls and arena's obstacles.

If you dodge-roll into a bullet correctly you'll catch it but be aware that a gun can hold two ghost-bullets only for a short while.

There is also a twist - every time you shoot, the speed of the next bullet increases, so watch out, it can get a bit crazy!

This game is for two players. Two xbox 360 controllers are required.

This is a free alpha version of a game originally created during Slavic Game Jam. Awarded for the Best Mulitplayer Experience and a 2nd place for the People's Choice Award.

@Polterguns is currently in development by:
